name: NS-37
location_str: West Texas Suborbital Launch Site/ Corn Ranch @ Corn Ranch, USA
description: NS-37 is the 16th crewed flight for the New Shepard program and the 37th in the New Shepard program's history.
rocket_fact: Hypergolic fuels ignite spontaneously upon contact with each other, making them reliable for restarting engines in space.
